import React, { useState, useContext } from 'react' import { FormContext } from '../context/FormContext' import axios from 'axios' const NewInvoice = () => { const { showForm, dispatch } = useContext(FormContext) const [invoiceForm, setInvoiceForm] = useState(false) const [formValue, setFormValue] = useState({ street: "", city: "", zipCode: "", country: "", clientName: "", clientEmail: "", clientCity: "", clientZipCode: "", clientCountry: "", date: "", amount: "", clientStreet: "" }) function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() setFormValue({ street: e.target.street.value, city: e.target.city.value, zipCode: e.target.zipCode.value, country: e.target.country.value, clientName: e.target.clientName.value, clientEmail: e.target.clientEmail.value, clientCity: e.target.clientCity.value, clientZipCode: e.target.clientZipCode.value, clientCountry: e.target.clientCountry.value, clientStreet: e.target.clientStreet.value, paymentDate: e.target.date.value, amount: e.target.amount.value, }) axios.post("http://localhost:5000/", ({ formValue })) .then((res) => console.log(res.data)) .catch((err) => console.log(err)) } return ( <> {showForm &&

New Invoice

{/* X */}

Bill From

Bill To

} ) } export default NewInvoice
